PackageOracle.name: DA_SUBSCRIPTION_BILLED_PRODUCT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SUBSCRIPTION_BILLED_PRODUCT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.20.997949000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,connect_dt IN DATE
,discount_start_dt IN DATE
,discount_end_dt IN DATE
,seasonal_start_dt IN DATE
,seasonal_end_dt IN DATE
,billing_prod_dscnt_id IN NUMBER
,billed_package_product_id IN NUMBER
,billed_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,billed_service_product_qty IN NUMBER
,charge_amt IN NUMBER
,charge_before_discount_amt IN NUMBER
,discount_amt IN NUMBER
,service_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billed_package_product_id IN NUMBER
,billed_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_subscription_billed_product;

body.name: DA_SUBSCRIPTION_BILLED_PRODUCT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SUBSCRIPTION_BILLED_PRODUCT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.21.008939000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,connect_dt IN DATE
,discount_start_dt IN DATE
,discount_end_dt IN DATE
,seasonal_start_dt IN DATE
,seasonal_end_dt IN DATE
,billing_prod_dscnt_id IN NUMBER
,billed_package_product_id IN NUMBER
,billed_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,billed_service_product_qty IN NUMBER
,charge_amt IN NUMBER
,charge_before_discount_amt IN NUMBER
,discount_amt IN NUMBER
,service_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_subscription_billed_product.add, parms=' || connect_dt || '|' || discount_start_dt || '|' || discount_end_dt || '|' || seasonal_start_dt || '|' || seasonal_end_dt || '|' || billing_prod_dscnt_id || '|' || billed_package_product_id || '|' || billed_service_product_id || '|' || subscription_id || '|' || billed_service_product_qty || '|' || charge_amt || '|' || charge_before_discount_amt || '|' || discount_amt || '|' || service_id || '|' || billing_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_subscription_billed_product a
(
a.connect_dt
,a.discount_start_dt
,a.discount_end_dt
,a.seasonal_start_dt
,a.seasonal_end_dt
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.billed_package_product_id
,a.billed_service_product_id
,a.subscription_id
,a.billed_service_product_qty
,a.charge_amt
,a.charge_before_discount_amt
,a.discount_amt
,a.service_id
,a.billing_start_dt
)
VALUES
(
add.connect_dt
,add.discount_start_dt
,add.discount_end_dt
,add.seasonal_start_dt
,add.seasonal_end_dt
,add.billing_prod_dscnt_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.billed_package_product_id
,add.billed_service_product_id
,add.subscription_id
,add.billed_service_product_qty
,add.charge_amt
,add.charge_before_discount_amt
,add.discount_amt
,add.service_id
,add.billing_start_dt
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_subscription_billed_product.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billed_package_product_id IN NUMBER
,billed_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,subscription_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_subscription_billed_product.del, parms=' || billed_package_product_id || '|' || billed_service_product_id || '|' || subscription_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_subscription_billed_product a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.billed_package_product_id = del.billed_package_product_id
AND a.billed_service_product_id = del.billed_service_product_id
AND a.subscription_id = del.subscription_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_subscription_billed_product.del');

END del;

END da_subscription_billed_product;
